shri dalada wandanawabuduhamuduruwo ipadune shri lankawedaruwoanagarika dharmapalathumaobe daruwata waradi karanna idahala witabuddhangala aaranya senasanayapallepola weluwanarama wiharayachiran jiwathu ambaagamuwe soratha himinawa arahadi budu guna bhawanawadhanawathkama ha ugathkama thibunath hithe sathutak nahaganegama saranankara nahimibuduhamuduruwo shreshtathama prathipaththiya penwu nayakayanoyisathuten ma sitina thanaththan bhikshun wahanseyikam sapayata wahal wu raja bisawalama gi saha kawinawalapitiya shri sudharma daham pasalaapi wemu sirilaka bodu daruwoa.po.sa sa/pela buddha dharma padam malawamishanari uwadurata goduru wu koriyanu budusasuna“aaloko udapadi” prahelika anka 01 jayagrahikawoajan brahmawanso maha therun wahansepasal guruwarayaku lesa mage athdakimsathuta labime mangadharma sakachchaanawabodha wiwahayan nisa gabsakaraganim wadiwelawadi wadath narakayisitha yanu lokayayiwaradi kala aya siragewalwalata yawimaparamithanuwanathi baluralalowada sangarawasakman bhawanawasonaka nam wu dilindu tharunayage dhaja pujawasarwa nirdoshi wenna haduwoth pidanaya wadiyiatasilbalagalla saraswathi piriwenadiwiyagaha yasassi nahimirate anagathaya bhara ganimata sitina lama parapura raka ganima jathika wagakimak lesa salaka katayuthu kala yuthu wuwada dinapatha madhya wartha mangin apata behowita asannata dakinnata labenne lamayinta siduwana hinsa pidawanya.

aya chinaya lan kara gaththe aya agamathikam kala 1960 - 65 kalayeya. 1963 indiyawa saha chinaya athara yuddhayak aarambha wimata giya wita eya nathara kirima sandaha madihath wimata aya idiripath wuwaya. 1963di aya ee sandaha wu yojanawaliyak ragena chinayata giyaya.

amathiwarayage pakshapathi kriyakarithwaya nisa ohuge kandayama gana wishwasayak nathi bawath janapathi yam kamituwak pathkarayi nam eeta ekanga bawath owun danwa thibuni kurunagala shikshana rohale sidu wu saka sahitha siseriyan sathkam sambandhayen soya balima sandaha janadhipathiwaraya yatathe wishesha kamituwak path karannayi rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya illa atha.
